T04D3854:286b-17: mthong ba'i spyod yul du ma gyur pa na /
T04D3854:286b-18: theg pa chen po'i rigs can dag la zab cing rgya che ba'i don su zhig 'chad par 'gyur /
T04D3854:286b-19: su zhig gi tshig la yid ches par bya zhe na /
T04D3854:286b-20: 'di ltar slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas /
T04D3854:286b-22: de'i gsung la yid ches par bya ste /
T04D3854:286b-23: bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhung du ma nas lung bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T04D3854:286b-24: 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa'i mdo las /
T04D3854:286b-25: lung bstan pa'i tshig ni med kyi /
T04D3854:286b-26: 'di 'on kyang li tstsha b'i sems can thams cad
T04D3854:286b-27: kyis mthong na dga' bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring
T04D3854:286b-28: bsrel las brtsams nas zab mo 'ba' zhig smra bar
T04D3854:286b-29: byed do // gzhan yang 'phags pa lang kar gshegs pa dang /
T04D3854:286b-30: mdo gzhan dag nas lung bstan cing /
T04D3854:286b-31: 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i rgyud chen po las kyang ji skad du /
T04D3854:286b-32: dge slong klu sgrub ces bya ba //
T04D3854:286b-33: rang bzhin med don de nyid rig / sa ni drug pa sgrub pa ste //
T04D3854:286b-36: de bzhin du 'phags pa sprin chen po'i mdo las kyang /
T04D3854:286b-38: lha'i bu dag bskal pa brjod du med pa'i sngon
T04D3854:286b-39: du de bzhin gshegs pa klu rigs sgron ma'i chos
T04D3854:286b-40: kyi rgyal po'i brtson 'grus chen po'i klu yum bstan
T04D3854:286b-41: pa 'dzin pa / blon po dam pa'i chos kyi mdzod 'dzin pa /
T04D3854:287a-0: rgyal po dang blon po gnyis sangs rgyas @287a * //
T04D3854:287a-1: kyi ring bsrel gyi gtam byas shing /
T04D3854:287a-2: rgyal pos legs par bshad pas dus der 'khor thams
T04D3854:287a-3: cad ngo mtshar skyes nas bcom ldan 'das la zhus
T04D3854:287a-4: pa / rgyal po 'di zab mo la mkhas pa'o zhes zhus pas /
T04D3854:287a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po'i yon tan rgyas par gsungs te /
T04D3854:287a-6: mdo de nyid du blta bar bya'o //
T04D3854:287a-7: de nas rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan
T04D3854:287a-8: 'das la rin po che spar gang gtor nas sems
T04D3854:287a-10: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sh'akya thub pa'i bstan pa nub pa'i tshe bdag rab tu byung ste /
T04D3854:287a-11: chos kyi mjug la bab pa na sgra chen po lan gsum du bsgrags pa la /
T04D3854:287a-12: chos gos tsam 'chang ba skra bregs pa rnams yul nas phyung zhing bskrad la /
T04D3854:287a-13: dam pa'i chos phyung ste dam pa'i chos kyi phyir
T04D3854:287a-14: bdag gi srog gtong bar gyur cig ces smon lam
T04D3854:287a-16: btsun mos kyang smon lam btab po //
T04D3854:287a-17: lha'i bu dag nga 'das pa'i 'og tu lo brgya phrag mang po 'das pa na /
T04D3854:287a-18: lho phyogs kyi rgyud du mkhar gyi rgyal po bde
T04D3854:287a-19: spyod bzang po zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur te
T04D3854:287a-20: / de'i tshe lo brgyad cu na dam pa'i chos
T04D3854:287a-21: nub par 'gyur ba'i lhag ma tsam lus pa na
T04D3854:287a-25: theg pa chen po yang gzhan la rgyas par 'chad
T04D3854:287a-26: par 'gyur ro zhes pa nas dge slong de lung
T04D3854:287a-27: bstan pa nyon cig / de ni nga la brten
T04D3854:287a-28: pa dang / nga'i bstan pa rgyas par byed pa dang /
T04D3854:287a-29: khur chen po khyer ba dang /
T04D3854:287a-30: nga'i sh'akya gzhon nu yin te /
T04D3854:287a-31: nga 'das pa'i 'og tu lho phyogs kyi rgyud du
T04D3854:287a-32: drang srong ri bo zhes bya ba'i yul du grong
T04D3854:287a-33: khyer chen po bsod nams ldan zhes bya ba 'byung
T04D3854:287a-34: bar 'gyur te / grong khyer chen po de'i byang phyogs su skye ste //
T04D3854:287a-35: 'bra go can gyi rje'u rigs rnam par dag pa skye bar 'gyur ro //
T04D3854:287a-36: sh'akya'i rigs gzhon nu li tstsha b'i'i bu sems can
T04D3854:287a-37: thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba byang chub sems
T04D3854:287b-0: nga'i dam pa'i chos rgyas par bya ba'i phyir der @287b rigs chen por skye bar 'gyur ro //
T04D3854:287b-1: de'i pha ma la sogs pa'i gnyen sde'i ming yang de'i ming las 'dogs so //
T04D3854:287b-2: 'bra go can gyi rje'u rigs kyang de bzhin gshegs
T04D3854:287b-3: pa'i rigs yin par blta'o zhes pa nas yang khye'u
T04D3854:287b-4: de yang skye bo thams cad kyis sdug par 'gyur
T04D3854:287b-5: zhing kun gyis bkur bar 'gyur ro //
T04D3854:287b-6: gang gi tshe khye'u rab tu byung ba na de'i
T04D3854:287b-7: 'khor rnams kyang dam pa'i chos kyi phyir srog gtong
T04D3854:287b-8: ba yin zhes pa nas yang de'i tshig la yid
T04D3854:287b-9: ches pa ni nyung zhing phal cher de la mi
T04D3854:287b-11: chos bzhi dang ldan na de'i tshig la yid ches te /
T04D3854:287b-12: sangs rgyas snga ma dag la mdo 'di thos pa dang /
T04D3854:287b-13: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa dang /
T04D3854:287b-14: lhag pa'i bsam pa brten pas dge ba'i rtsa ba brtan pa dang /
T04D3854:287b-15: rgya chen po la mos pa lus kyi mngon sum du byas pa'o //
T04D3854:287b-16: de la yid mi ches pa thams cad ni bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i gti mug can no //
T04D3854:287b-17: de la mos pa dag ni sangs rgyas kyis yongs su gzung ba'o zhes pa nas //
T04D3854:287b-18: yang de la bsnyen bkur byas na dus gsum gyi
T04D3854:287b-19: sangs rgyas thams cad la bsnyen bkur byas par 'gyur
T04D3854:287b-20: ro // de'i tshig mnyan pa na dus gsum gyi
T04D3854:287b-21: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bka' mnyan par 'gyur ro
T04D3854:287b-22: zhes pa nas yang de 'chi ba'i dus byed pa
T04D3854:287b-23: na nga'i dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ro //
T04D3854:287b-24: de dang 'dra ba'i gang zag ni med de mi srid do //
T04D3854:287b-25: yang de'i phyogs byed pa dang /
T04D3854:287b-26: de'i gzhung rgyas par byed pa dang ;
T04D3854:287b-28: de'i gzhung 'dzin pa de dag ni mngon par sangs
T04D3854:287b-29: rgyas pa'i dus su 'khor gyi gtso bor 'gyur ro
T04D3854:287b-30: // bskal pa bzang po de'i rjes la bskal pa drug cur sangs rgyas mi 'byung ngo //
T04D3854:287b-31: de'i rjes la sangs rgyas bdun 'byung ngo //
T04D3854:287b-32: de nas 'jig rten gyi khams dang ba'i 'od ces
T04D3854:287b-33: bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'byung gnas
T04D3854:287b-34: 'od ces bya ba la sogs pa dang /
T04D3854:287b-35: de'i ming thos pa yang don che ba'o //
T04D3854:288a-0: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mdzad pa byed pa'o zhes bya @288a * //
T04D3854:288a-1: ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T04D3854:288a-2: mdo de nyid du blta bar bya'o //
T04D3854:288a-3: gzhan yang dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
T04D3854:288a-4: man ngag slob dpon gyi zhal snga nas gnang ba'i
T04D3854:288a-5: gsang sngags kyi gzhung gsang pa las kyang ches gsang
T04D3854:288a-6: ba / blo gros phul du byung ba /
T04D3854:288a-7: shes rab sbyangs pa dang ldan pa /
T04D3854:288a-8: ngang gis snying rje che ba /
T04D3854:288a-9: sngon chad skye ba grangs med cing rgya che ba spyad pa la goms pa yod pa /
T04D3854:288a-10: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa /
T04D3854:288a-11: tshogs rnam pa gnyis bsags pa la goms pa /
T04D3854:288a-12: tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas nyid 'dod pas spyad par bya ste /
T04D3854:288a-13: de ni 'di ltar dbang po rnon po'i spyod yul yin pa dang /
T04D3854:288a-14: spang bar bya ba'i ngo bo nyid yongs su shes pa dang /
T04D3854:288a-15: bde ba nyid du spyod pa dang /
T04D3854:288a-16: tshogs gnyis bsags pa la mkhas pa dang /
T04D3854:288a-17: de kho na nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin bskyed pa
T04D3854:288a-18: la thabs rmad du byung ba mang ba nyid yin
T04D3854:288a-19: pa dang / rnam par rtog pa rgyang ring du spong ba dang /
T04D3854:288a-20: bdag la sgrub pa dang ma bral ba yin no //
T04D3854:288a-21: slob dpon gyi zhal snga nas /
T04D3854:288a-22: byis pa rnams ni gzugs la chags //
T04D3854:288a-24: gzugs sogs ngo bo nyid shes nas //
T04D3854:288a-25: blo mchog rnams ni grol bar 'gyur //
T04D3854:288a-27: 'phags pa lha'i zhal snga nas kyang /
T04D3854:288a-29: yang na legs par bros par bya //
T04D3854:288a-30: bar ma do yi dngos pos ni //
T04D3854:288a-33: blo gros 'bring po rnams kyis ni /
T04D3854:288a-34: sngar ji skad bshad pa bzhin du gnas pas brtson 'grus dang /
T04D3854:288a-35: dbang po rab kyis bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis sangs rgyas nyid thob la /
T04D3854:288a-36: de las gzhan pa nyid kyis bskal pa grangs med pa bdun dang /
T04D3854:288a-37: bskal pa grangs med pa sum cu rtsa gsum gyis so //
T04D3854:288a-38: slob dpon gyi zhal snga nas kyi che ba brjod pa'i skabs rdzogs s+ho /
T04D3854:288b-0: // /'di'i don la gnas pa'i byang chub @288b sems dpa'i rnal 'byor pa la /
T04D3854:288b-1: tshe 'di nyid la phan yon dpag tu med pa thob ste /
T04D3854:288b-2: 'di ltar 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad kyang mi 'byung zhing /
T04D3854:288b-3: dus ma yin par 'chi ba las kyang rgyal bar 'gyur te /
T04D3854:288b-4: mtshan nyid med pa'i bde chen po //
T04D3854:288b-5: stong nyid rnal 'byor dam pa ni //
T04D3854:288b-6: 'chi ba slu ba'i gtso bo ste //
T04D3854:288b-9: nad thams cad las rgyal ba thob ste /
T04D3854:288b-11: bshad dang gci ba 'byung ba dang //
T04D3854:288b-12: rims dang nad la sogs pa dang //
T04D3854:288b-13: rang bzhin rgas pa la sogs pa //
T04D3854:288b-14: rtag tu sgyu mas gso bar bya //
T04D3854:288b-16: bdud dang gdon gyi rigs thams cad dang /
T04D3854:288b-17: bar du gcod pa thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur te /
T04D3854:288b-18: gang 'dir rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu ba //
T04D3854:288b-19: sgyu ma nam mkha'i ngo bor rnam rtog pa //
T04D3854:288b-20: 'di ni bsrung ba'i mchog tu gsungs pa ste //
T04D3854:288b-21: bsrung ba'i cho ga gzhan dag 'dir ci dgos //
T04D3854:288b-24: thams cad nam mkha' dang 'dra bar bsgom pa ni bsrung ba'i mchog yin no zhes gsungs so //
T04D3854:288b-26: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas bsrungs pa
T04D3854:288b-27: la ni srung ba gzhan gyis bsrung mi dgos so
T04D3854:288b-28: zhes gsungs so // yang gsungs pa /
T04D3854:288b-29: stong pa nyid ni rnam bsgoms na //
T04D3854:288b-30: 'chi bdag gis ni ma mthong zhing //
T04D3854:288b-31: gzhan yang bdud ni bye bas kyang //
T04D3854:288b-32: mthong pas 'gyur ba ma yin no //
T04D3854:288b-34: sdug bsngal thams cad las kyang rgyal ba thob ste /
T04D3854:288b-35: 'phags pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i mdo las /
T04D3854:288b-36: sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying
T04D3854:288b-37: po yod do zhes ston par byed pa'i sems can
T04D3854:288b-38: de dag ni yon tan dpag tu med pa dang
T04D3854:288b-39: ldan pa ste / dam pa'i chos 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu de dag ni /
T04D3854:288b-40: sdig pa'i las grangs med pa byas pa rnams /
T04D3854:288b-44: skur pa btab pa tsam gyis byang bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so //
T04D3854:289a-1: ye shes phyag rgya'i mdo las kyang /
T04D3854:289a-2: de'i rgyud la bskal pa mang por bsags pa'i sdig pa'i las kyi sgrib pa yod pa de ni /
T04D3854:289a-3: klad pan btsam gyis 'byang bar 'gyur ro zhes pa nas /
T04D3854:289a-4: nam yang tha na rmi lam sdig pa can mthong bas kyang /
T04D3854:289a-5: las kyi sgrib pa de dag kyang 'byang bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so //
T04D3854:289a-6: slob dpon gyi zhal snga nas kyang /
T04D3854:289a-7: mthong ba'i chos la mya ngan 'das //
T04D3854:289a-8: bya ba byas pa'ang de nyid yin //
T04D3854:289a-10: sdug bsngal brgya rtsa bcur bshad pa //
T04D3854:289a-12: 'jig rten chos kyis mi gos te //
T04D3854:289a-14: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal kun bral yang //
T04D3854:289a-16: rang bzhin mya ngan 'das pa nyid //
T04D3854:289a-17: mya ngan 'das la gnas mi byed //
T04D3854:289a-18: nyon mongs me yis gdungs pa med //
T04D3854:289a-19: nyon mongs ldan pa lta bur ston //
T04D3854:289a-20: sems med sems can ma yin te //
T04D3854:289a-21: mnyam gzhag rjes thob med par bsgom //
T04D3854:289a-22: phan yon gyi skabs rdzogs so /
T04D3854:289a-24: // / nyams dga' 'tshe ba thams cad bral ba yi //
T04D3854:289a-25: shing rta chen po'i lam 'di bshad pa las //
T04D3854:289a-26: bsod nams bsags pa de yis 'gro ba rnams //
T04D3854:289a-27: rkang gnyis dbang po'i gnas su 'gro bar shog / bka' ma lus pa'i snying po bsdus pa /
T04D3854:289a-28: de kho na nyid gsal por ston pa dbu ma rin po che'i sgron ma /
T04D3854:289a-29: bdag dang gzhan thams cad kyi grub pa'i mtha' rgya
T04D3854:289a-30: mtsho lta bu mkhyen pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
T04D3854:289a-31: sku tshe 'di nyid la sku lus de nyid kyis
T04D3854:289a-32: rig 'dzin gyi gnas su gshegs pa'i slob dpon mkhas
T04D3854:289a-33: pa chen po bha byas slob dpon 'phags pa klu
T04D3854:289a-34: sgrub kyi gsung bzhin du mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T04D3854:289a-36: // / bla ma rje btsun zangs gling pa dge bsnyen mgon po la /
T04D3854:289a-37: pandi ta chen po d'i pam ka ra shr'i dzny'a nas bka' drin zhus pa las /
T04D3854:289a-38: phyis so ma pu ri'i gtsug lag khang du rgya brtson 'grus seng ge dang /
T04D3854:289a-39: nag tsho tshul khrims rgyal ba gnyis kyis yang dang
